text: The helium hydride ion, also called helonium, is a cation (chemical compound with a positive electric charge) made of helium and hydrogen. It has the chemical formula . It first formed shortly after the Big Bang, making it the oldest molecule in the universe. Helium hydride is the strongest known acid. It cannot be made as a liquid or solid because it will react with any other molecule it touches. == Sources == Category:Helium compounds Category:Superacids Category:Binary acids Category:Onium ions
title: Helium hydride ion
